title: North End - LARGE 2 Bed 2 Bath on Hanover Street
posting_body: ['ASK FOR A LINK TO THE FULL VIDEO TOUR!', 'Available 9/1 - NO Fee!', "Spacious 2 Bed, 2 Bath in an amazing location on Hanover Street in Boston's North End!", 'Enjoy endless dining and entertainment options right outside your doorstep.', '100/100 walk score in Boston\'s "Little Italy."', 'Close walking distance to Haymarket, the Financial District, Quincy Market, Faneuil Hall, the Waterfront, and more!', 'Apartment Features:', '- Large 2 Bed, 2 Bath', '- Available 9/1', '- ~1,200 SF', '- Private Enclosed Patio', '- Hardwood Flooring', '- Kitchen features dishwasher/disposal, gas cooking range, and microwave', '- IN-UNIT Washer/Dryer', '- High Ceilings', '- Central Air, Gas Heat', '- Cat Friendly!', "No Broker's Fee!", "First and last month's rent required plus a $100 key fee.", 'Contact us to schedule your in-person tour today!', 'No smoking.', "First month's rent, last month's rent, and $100 key fee."]
